long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IT Time Table - Read-Only Viewer
Stay on top of your IT staff scheduling with this sleek and user-friendly time table viewer! Designed specifically for IT shifts, this extension provides a read-only display of staff assignments for the week, segmented by four time slots:

08:00 - 15:00
15:00 - 20:00
20:00 - 00:00
00:00 - 08:00
üîç Key Features:

Real-Time Staff Overview: Automatically detects the current day and slot to highlight ongoing shifts.
Database Integration: Fetches live data from database for up-to-date schedules.
Loading Indicator: See a spinner while the schedule loads.
Responsive Table Design: View the entire week‚Äôs schedule with just a glance
